title: Altinn text resource file
description: Schema that describes a set of text resources for Altinn applications.

$schema.title: Schema
$schema.description: The schema that this file adheres to

language.title: Language
language.description: The language of these text resources. Must match the file name, using ISO 639-1 two letter language codes.

id.title: Text resource ID
id.description: Must be unique within the file

value.title: Text resource value
value.description: The text resource value. Variables should be enclosed in curly brackets, e.g. {0}, {1}, etc.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: A list of variables that can be used in the text resource value

variable.description: A variable that can be used in a text resource

key.title: Variable lookup location
key.description: Location of the variable in the data source

dataSource-data-model.title: Data model
dataSource-data-model.description: The variable is fetched from a named data model

dataSource-instanceContext.title: Instance context
dataSource-instanceContext.description: The variable is fetched from the instance context

dataSource-applicationSettings.title: Application settings
dataSource-applicationSettings.description: The variable is fetched from the application settings
